title: What are the best beat drops in rap songs? - Quora

response.answer_text: You can Listen to Xxxtentacion's old scream rap songs,Ghostmane,Sucicideboys,Scarlxrd and other scream rappers/mumble rappers.Token has some sick beat not beat drops precisely but you can give him a try. Some of my fav songs: 1.Take a step back-Xxxtentacion 2.Mercury-Ghostmane 3.Caution-Xxxtentacion 4.Look at me-Xxxtentacion 4.All the way up-Fat Joe,Remy ma ft.French Montana Or All the way up-Fat Joe,Remy ma ft.French Montana(David Guetta remix) 5.Rip Roach-Xxxtentacion 6.Rake-Ghostmane 7.6 Feet-Scarlxrd 8.The purge-Scarxrld 9.Heart attack-Scarxrld 10.D Rose-Lil pump 11.Gucci Gang-Lil pump 12.Denzel curry-Ultimate 13.Icon-Jaden Smith 14.Goku-Jaden Smith 15.The hills-The Weekend 16.Yiken-Pricelesa Da Roc 17.Gucci Linen-Black Bear 18.Fed-Bazanji 19.El Chapo-Skrillex,The Game 20.Burns-Scarlxrd 21.Panda-Desiigner 22.WDYM-Carnage,Lil Uzi Vert 23.Speakerbox-Bassnectar Do give my Spotify playlist a listen for more hyped shit:Hyped Shit ⚠, a playlist by nagdeve.sharad on Spotify Please Like/upvote if you liked any of the songs mentioned above.Have fun;)

Here are some best beat drops in rap songs: Ghostmane- Mercury Desiinger- Outlet Denzel Curry- Ultimate Denzel Curry- Sumo Lil Pump- Boss Smokepurpp- Audi 6ix9ine- Gummo The Game & Skrillex- El Chapo Bones- BlastZones Carnage- Up Nxw ft. Scarlxrd Scarlxrd- Heartattack Goth- Kamikaze Lil Toenail- F*ck Sh*t Bones & Chris Travis- We Up Ic3peak- This world is sick That’s all for now. Most of them are mumble or scream rappers ’cause their songs have awesome high bass drops. Please upvote if you enjoyed the songs. Peace out!
